Summaries.eng: In an accident, an ordinary boy, Wang Xiaoxiu, obtains a space system called "Superpower Cube" from a high-latitude cosmic civilization and gains extraordinary powers. When the school belle, Shen Yao, Wang Xiaoxiuâ€™s longtime crush, confesses her love to him, the delinquent Sun Jun, who also has a crush on her, is provoked. Wang Xiaoxiu resolves the crisis with his wit and extraordinary powers, but it also brings more disasters as a result. Shen Yao is taken to the world of extraordinary beings by a mysterious person, and Wang Xiaoxiu embarks on a journey to rescue her. Fighting in the bizarre universe, he finds the meaning of fairness and justice on the path to becoming a peerless powerhouse.

Titles.eng: Super A Reincarnation? The goddess confessed to me!

Summaries.eng: Xiaoxiu Wang, an ordinary student, is thrilled when his childhood friend Yao Shen, with whom he has been in love forever, admits she's interested in him. But this love comes at a price. Jun Sun, the leader of the North District gang, also covets her and has him beaten up by his men and thrown into the river. Just as he's about to drown, he discovers a mysterious glowing cube.

Titles.eng: Upgrade! Battle 5? Not to be feared!

Summaries.eng: After being miraculously saved from the waters by the mysterious cube, Xiaoxiu realizes that it grants him superpowers, such as the ability to teleport. He will have to learn to master them quickly, because Jun and his gang are tenacious and determined to finish him off.

Titles.eng: Melee! Is Wang Xiaoxiu still human?

Summaries.eng: Feeling empowered by his newfound powers, Xiaoxiu decides to take on the North District gang to protect Yao. But when he arrives at the gym where Jun has arranged to meet him, he finds himself facing thirteen seasoned fighters against whom he has little chance of winning alone. Will his superpowers be enough?

Feeling empowered by his newfound powers, Xiaoxiu decides to take on the North District gang to protect Yao. But when he arrives at the gym where Jun has arranged to meet him, he finds himself facing thirteen seasoned fighters against whom he has little chance of winning alone. Will his superpowers be enough?

Titles.eng: G.I. Joe Tower Climb: Wheel of Fortune

Summaries.eng: Luo Yan, a young mafia boss, has taken Yao hostage to lure Qin Xigu, the man who saved her as a child. But the first to arrive on the scene is Xiaoxiu, and he's determined to save his girlfriend by any means necessary. Will he be able to defeat the highly trained mercenaries hired by Luo?

Titles.eng: G.I. Joe Tower Climb: Monster Girl

Summaries.eng: After defeating three members of the Martial Arts Alliance, Xiaoxiu is about to face two of its most powerful representatives, Jialin and Stone. Will he be able to defeat them and save Yao?

Titles.eng: G.I. Joe Tower Climb: Funding for Explosive Fights

Summaries.eng: Xiaoxiu is now very close to his goal. With Qin Xigu eliminating the penultimate obstacle in his path, all that remains is for the young man to defeat Mushan Chu. But the puppeteer is a devious and particularly tough opponent. Will he be able to defeat him and save Yao?

Titles.eng: Being Tricked By A Black-Hearted Agent Into Working As A Bodyguard

Summaries.eng: Xiaoxiu has lost Yao, the ability to speak to the cube, and any means of finding Luo Yan and Qin Xigu. Desperate, he is approached by a woman who claims to know where Luo is. Who is she? And what exactly does she want?

Titles.eng: Rudra's Feast: Warriors and Golden Bells

Summaries.eng: Xiaoxiu has been recruited by Yuqian Mu, head of the Superhuman Supervision Unit, to protect a VIP in exchange for information on Luo Yan and Qin Xigu. But his mission will prove even more complex and dangerous than his bodyguard contract suggested...

After a genetically modified crocodile as an appetizer, Weibang Du serves his guests an even tougher second course. But Xiaoxiu notices some unusual behavior among his team, and things quickly escalate. What is Mr. Piao and the other bodyguards' real purpose at this banquet?

Titles.eng: Rudra's Feast: The Strength of the Young Lady

Summaries.eng: After battling a genetically modified crocodile as an appetizer, Weibang Du serves his guests an even tougher second course. But Xiaoxiu notices some unusual behavior among his team, and things quickly escalate. What is Mr. Piao and the other bodyguards' real purpose at this banquet?
